lines.text: What are you trying to do, get off with me?
lines.character: Ice Cream Seller in the Park

lines.text: That's no guarantee of good behaviour!
lines.character: Ice Cream Seller in the Park

lines.text: Is there any news sir? About the baby I mean?
I don't suppose the mother thinks so.
I know exactly what happened to that baby. It's my opinion the Russians have got him.
I wonder when you'll start thinking it's my fault.
I'm afraid we'll have to charge her you know, but we'll do the best we can.
